publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7981 Bill Kidd: Congratulating a Friend of Nuclear Disarmament in Scotland and the World—That the Parliament congratulates the Hon. Douglas Roche O.C. on his nomination for the 2011 Nobel Peace Prize for his lifelong devotion to the cause of disarmament, notably nuclear disarmament; commends his commitment to nuclear disarmament through his role as founder or co-founder of the Middle Powers Initiative, Parliamentarians for Nuclear Non-Proliferation and Parliamentarians for Global Action, as well as his long-time friendship and commitment in support of the disarmament cause in Scotland, and welcomes his nomination for the award by the International Peace Bureau. Supported by: Hugh O’Donnell*, Christina McKelvie*, Bill Wilson*, Elaine Smith*, Stewart Maxwell*, Ian McKee*

S3M-7981 Congratulating a Friend of Nuclear Disarmament in Scotland and the World (lodged on 22 February 2011) Jamie Hepburn*, Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Mike Pringle*, Brian Adam*, Robin Harper*
S3M-7981 Congratulating a Friend of Nuclear Disarmament in Scotland and the World (lodged on 22 February 2011) Willie Coffey*

S3M-7981 Bill Kidd: Congratulating a Friend of Nuclear Disarmament in Scotland and the World—That the Parliament congratulates the Hon. Douglas Roche O.C. on his nomination for the 2011 Nobel Peace Prize for his lifelong devotion to the cause of disarmament, notably nuclear disarmament; commends his commitment to nuclear disarmament through his role as founder or co-founder of the Middle Powers Initiative, Parliamentarians for Nuclear Non-Proliferation and Parliamentarians for Global Action, as well as his long-time friendship and commitment in support of the disarmament cause in Scotland, and welcomes his nomination for the award by the International Peace Bureau. Supported by: Hugh O’Donnell, Christina McKelvie, Bill Wilson, Elaine Smith, Stewart Maxwell, Ian McKee, Jamie Hepburn, Rob Gibson, Bob Doris, Joe FitzPatrick, Mike Pringle, Brian Adam, Robin Harper, Willie Coffey, Gil Paterson*
S3M-7981 Congratulating a Friend of Nuclear Disarmament in Scotland and the World (lodged on 22 February 2011) Marlyn Glen*
S3M-7981 Congratulating a Friend of Nuclear Disarmament in Scotland and the World (lodged on 22 February 2011) Stuart McMillan*
